name: Verify algo NFSP value for algo only segmented users

testSteps.description: Given Register a fully registered user through RF
And Assign the segment based on admin property 'algo_only_segment'

testSteps.description: When Do a search and Verify SERP page
Then Verify algo NFSP source and segment as per admin config 'nfspAccessIds','mx_d','mx_t','mx_m'

children.description: Get nfsp source from page source
